about_the_game: Heavy Metal Titans is a modern-retro Run n’ Gun Shoot ‘em up that takes players on a bloodsoaked time traveling quest to defeat General Glen Planamento and retrieve the stolen time crystal, a powerful relic that can manipulate time and reality. Choose one of seven playable characters (plus two unlockables) including a vampire, a dragon slayer, an old west cowboy, and real-life pro wrestler: WARHORSE! Each hero has been ripped from his own timeline by the gods of Olympus to assemble….The Heavy Metal Titans!  Slash, shoot, and pound your way through a violent alien war, spanning over multiple timelines with a heart-pounding heavy metal soundtrack, all while the action is called by legendary game announcer, Tim Kitzrow! So grab a controller and light ‘em up!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04+ or equivalent
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04+ or equivalent
  • Processor: 6 Core or Greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660 or Higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For local multiplayer support, you will need atleast two controllers.

mac_requirements.minimum:
